title: 49ers-Browns MNF Recap, Coaches Hot Seat Rankings (Football 10/8)
description:
John Breech is joined by Sean Wagner-McGough and Jared Dubin to recap the 49ers win over the Browns (3:30). The guys focus on another disappointing effort from Baker Mayfield and the Cleveland offense, the legitimacy of San Fran an an epic celebration from Nick Bosa. Next, John, Sean and Jared take a longer look at the Redskins a day after Jay Gruden's firing (24:30), examining potential replacements in DC. We hit Monday news (39:30) and finish with a discussion on the hottest seats for coaches around the NFL (47:00). 
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy

itunes:subtitle: John Breech, Sean Wagner-McGough and Jared Dubin break down the 49ers dominant victory over the Browns on Monday Night Football.
